Body:
count = mp.Value('I', lock=True)
max_count = mp.Value('I', lock=True)
sino, angles = create_test_sino_3d(Nx=10, Ny=10)
p = get_test_parameter_set(1)[0]
f = odtbrain.backpropagate_3d(sino, angles, padval=0, dtype=np.float64,
    copy=False, **p)
odtbrain.apple.correct(f=f, res=p['res'], nm=p['nm'], enforce_envelope=0.95,
    max_iter=100, min_diff=0.01, count=count, max_count=max_count)
assert count.value == max_count.value
